languages.text: {n}Вокс Паскаля траурно шипит:{/n} "С твоего позволения, я извлеку управляющие блоки сей благородной машины, чтобы провести бдение по ее усопшему духу. Омниссия хранит не предавших".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вокс Паскаля траурно шипит:{/n} "С твоего позволения, я извлеку управляющие блоки сей благородной машины, чтобы провести бдение по ее усопшему духу. Омниссия хранит не предавших".

languages.text: {n}Pasqal's vox hisses mournfully,{/n} "With your permission, I would extract the command blocks of this noble machine to hold a vigil for its deceased spirit. The Omnissiah preserves the faithful."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс Паскаля траурно шипит:{/n} "С твоего позволения, я извлеку управляющие блоки сей благородной машины, чтобы провести бдение по ее усопшему духу. Омниссия хранит не предавших".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pascal's vox hisses mournfully,{/n} "With your permission, I would extract the command blocks of this noble machine so as to hold a vigil for its deceased spirit. The Omnissiah preserves those who have not betrayed."

{n}Pascal's vox hisses mournfully,{/n} "With your permission, I would extract the command blocks of this noble machine so as to hold a vigil for its deceased spirit. The Omnissiah preserves those who have not betrayed."
{n}Pasqal's vox hisses mournfully,{/n} "With your permission, I would extract the command blocks of this noble machine to hold a vigil for its deceased spirit. The Omnissiah preserves the faithful."

{n}Pasqal's vox hisses mournfully,{/n} "With your permission, I would extract the command blocks of this noble machine to hold a vigil for its deceased spirit. The Omnissiah preserves the faithful."

languages.text: {n}El voco de Pasqal sisea, pesaroso.{/n} «Con su permiso, me gustaría extraer los bloques de mando de esta noble máquina para celebrar una vigilia por su difunto espíritu. El Omnissiah preserva a sus fieles».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox hisses mournfully,{/n} "With your permission, I would extract the command blocks of this noble machine to hold a vigil for its deceased spirit. The Omnissiah preserves the faithful."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco de Pasqal sisea, pesaroso.{/n} «Con su permiso, me gustaría extraer los bloques de mando de esta noble máquina para celebrar una vigilia por su difunto espíritu. El Omnissiah preserva a sus fieles».

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵系统发出了哀伤的嘶嘶声。{/n}“如果您允许，我希望能提取这台高贵机器的指令模块，为它逝去的机魂守夜。愿欧姆尼塞亚守护它忠实的仆人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox hisses mournfully,{/n} "With your permission, I would extract the command blocks of this noble machine to hold a vigil for its deceased spirit. The Omnissiah preserves the faithful."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵系统发出了哀伤的嘶嘶声。{/n}“如果您允许，我希望能提取这台高贵机器的指令模块，为它逝去的机魂守夜。愿欧姆尼塞亚守护它忠实的仆人。”

languages.text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスが悲し気に唸る。{/n}「あなたが許可してくだされば、この高貴な機械のコマンドブロックを取り出して、亡くなった魂のために祈りを捧げよう。万機神は忠実な者をお守りくださる」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox hisses mournfully,{/n} "With your permission, I would extract the command blocks of this noble machine to hold a vigil for its deceased spirit. The Omnissiah preserves the faithful."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスが悲し気に唸る。{/n}「あなたが許可してくだされば、この高貴な機械のコマンドブロックを取り出して、亡くなった魂のために祈りを捧げよう。万機神は忠実な者をお守りくださる」

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Vox zischt traurig.{/n} "Mit Eurer Erlaubnis würde ich gerne die Befehlsblöcke dieser edlen Maschine entnehmen, um für ihren verstorbenen Geist eine Totenwache abzuhalten. Der Omnissiah bewahrt die Gläubigen."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox hisses mournfully,{/n} "With your permission, I would extract the command blocks of this noble machine to hold a vigil for its deceased spirit. The Omnissiah preserves the faithful."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Vox zischt traurig.{/n} "Mit Eurer Erlaubnis würde ich gerne die Befehlsblöcke dieser edlen Maschine entnehmen, um für ihren verstorbenen Geist eine Totenwache abzuhalten. Der Omnissiah bewahrt die Gläubigen."

languages.text: {n}Le vox de Pasqal émet un sifflement attristé.{/n} « Avec votre permission, j'aimerais extraire les blocs de commandement de cette noble machine afin d'organiser une veillée pour son esprit décédé. L'Omnimessie préserve les fidèles. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox hisses mournfully,{/n} "With your permission, I would extract the command blocks of this noble machine to hold a vigil for its deceased spirit. The Omnissiah preserves the faithful."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox de Pasqal émet un sifflement attristé.{/n} « Avec votre permission, j'aimerais extraire les blocs de commandement de cette noble machine afin d'organiser une veillée pour son esprit décédé. L'Omnimessie préserve les fidèles. »

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksu kederle tıslıyor.{/n} "İzniniz olursa bu soylu makinenin komut bloklarını çıkartmak ve ölen ruhu için ibadet etmek istiyorum. Hermesih inananları korur."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox hisses mournfully,{/n} "With your permission, I would extract the command blocks of this noble machine to hold a vigil for its deceased spirit. The Omnissiah preserves the faithful."

traits.locale_text: {n}Paqal'ın voksu kederle tıslıyor.{/n} "İznin olursa bu soylu makinenin komut bloklarını çıkartmak ve ölen ruhunun üzerine bir ibadet gerçekleştirmek istiyorum. Hermesih inananları korur."
